Name: Silver Sable
Description: Silver Sable trained her entire life, becoming a master of a wide variety of weapons and training in all forms of hand-to-hand combat in preparation for the day she would inherit leadership of the Wild Pack.
FirstComicDescription: Silver Sable's first appearance! The bounty-hunter organization Silver Sable Inc. always gets their man...dead or alive! They've set their sights on the crook called Fox, and Spidey must do everything he can to save him!
